Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://sublimehousetea.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl-delay
Crawl-delay: 1

# Disallow admin areas (if any)
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /_next/
Disallow: /static/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /
Allow: /products
Allow: /categories
Allow: /about
Allow: /contact
